name: Kendo Crush! Visual Novel Game
blurb: Kendo Crush! is a sports themed, slice of life story-based game with elements of dating-sim; fully voiced and extensively interactive!

rewards.reward: -= Credits =-                                                                                                      ============================= We appreciate you supporting the project! Your name will be listed in our credits as an original contributor.

-= Digital Treats =-                                                                                       ============================= You will be rewarded with the digital artbook (including concepts, designer notes and more), the complete downloadable OST (Lossless format), and KickStarter specific wallpapers! ALL previous rewards are also included.

-= It's like watching an Anime! =-                                                                            ============================= You will have access to 'episodic' release of Kendo Crush! That means you can enjoy the game chapter to chapter as it is completed instead of having to wait for the full final release! ALL previous rewards are also included.

-= The Alpha Tester =-                                                                                                                                                      ============================= With the Alpha Tester status, you can enjoy first access at the continuing story ahead of it's episodic release via the tester version. Additionally, you can provide feedback that will directly help in shaping the game! ALL previous rewards are also included.

-= Get a Character Sketch?! =- ============================= Choose a character and get a sketch of them in whatever pose, outfit and style you'd like. ALL previous rewards are also included except "Talk to a Character?!".

-= Talk to a Character?! =- ============================= Say a line or ask a question to a character of your choosing. They will react or respond to you complete with emotion and voicing! ALL previous rewards are also included except "Get a Character Sketch?!".

-= There Since The Beginning =- ============================= All digital games PixelFade creates now and in the future will be available to you free of charge forever. Additionally, you will have direct 1 on 1 contact with PixelFade where you can ask any questions (regarding the game, indie development, life in general... whatever you'd like!). ALL previous rewards are also included.

-= The Director =- ============================= Work closely with one of our developers to create a complete event that will be incorporated into the game. This includes all asset creation including CG arts, backgrounds, custom character sprites\u2026etc. ALL previous rewards are also included.

-= The Cameo =- ============================= \r\nWe will create a side character based completely on your preferences and incorporate them into the storyline. (BONUS: With a single pledge to this tier, Techman will also be included into the storyline!) ALL previous rewards are also included.

-= The Producer =- ============================= Producer credit and access to all content as it is created live. We will create a side character based completely on your preferences and incorporate them into the storyline. You are invited to any project team meetings and will also be included in all our brainstorming/writing sessions. You will create custom character outfits / styles for EACH character to really personalize your game and MC! Additionally, please let us know if you are looking for a specific reward and we'll do our best to deliver! ALL previous rewards are also included.
